Metadata: VRC Outlook: A Voice for Sustainable Tourism Down East (Number 4, October 2010)
Three newsletter issues for 2010 (MEU-N-10-07a; MEU-N-10-07b; MEU-N-10-07c)

The Vacationland Resource Committee represents sustainable tourism interests in Washington and Hancock counties. Newsletter features stories on nature-based tourism, hospitality training, funding and grants, tourism marketing, and green tips for businesses.
